contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have an idea or project? I'm open to collaborating and building creative solutions.

hero.description: I craft elegant, scalable, and performant digital solutions using TypeScript, React, Node.js, Python, C++, Azure, and SQL-based systems. My passion lies in building accessible, responsive, and future-proof user experiences.
